response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premier product, which I believe has the potential to significantly impact and benefit your business. Given its exceptional features and capabilities, I am confident it could be a valuable asset to your operations. We are offering this remarkable product to you at an exclusive price of $950,000, aiming to provide you with the best possible value while ensuring we maintain a fair return on our investment. I look forward to discussing how this product can contribute to your success. Please let me know if you have any questions or require further information.", "product_price": 950000}
